website_summaries.verdict: The attractive Libratone Q Adapt On-Ear headphones deliver above-average noise cancellation and quality Bluetooth audio at a relatively affordable price.
cons: On-ear controls are easy to accidentally press
Sculpted sound signature not for purists

customer_reviews.title: Great on-ear noise cancelling option for those wary of bulky over-ears
customer_reviews.text: While there are certainly over-ear options from other companies that can provide great sound and noise isolation, these headphones were also very impressive in these areas given their smaller form factor for travelling and commuting. It seemed to check all the major boxes in terms of great sound quality, effective noise cancelling, wired use without power, touch controls (though this was the only area where the headphones were a little slow to respond), sensors for pausing (upon removing them), strong battery life and relatively small form factor. One added bonus was the ability to switch through a few levels of noise-cancelling intensity directly from the headphones (in addition to the app), which some other models do not permit.
customer_reviews.author: Neo Raven

customer_reviews.title: Superb value for money, efficient ANC and pass through functions.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, great ANC that does a very decent job blocking out even voices (within good reason). Very good pass through function (voices/sound comes through the mic), and great touch controls. Super demanding listeners might be bothered by a mild hiss sound at max ANC, but then they should pay about 2.5 times more to get a competitive solution. Super like the detailing with the illuminated logo. App does what it's meant to. Good thing it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Loukas K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on-ear headphone for noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - 4 Optional levels of noise cancellation. - Nice-looking appearance - Easy to control with gestures Cons: - If you use glasses, it's better to use over-ear or in-ear headphones. Wearing on-ear ones, including this, makes me feel uncomfortable, especially when you need to push your glasses... - It gets dirty easily (the white one) - The headphone interface is too sensitive. I cannot wear it when lying. Anyway, if you need a headphone to deal with the noise when commuting, it's a good choice. It's certainly one of the best headphones I've used, in terms of noise cancellation. But it's hard to wear it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Stylish headphones for commuters
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great features, noise cancelling is good for mid range headphones. Wouldn’t have paid full price for these but at only £117 they are a bargain in my view and absolutely the best i’ve tried under £150. Love the fact you don’t look like a cyber man (fool) when you’re wearing them as well, unlike virtually every other headset on the market. I read a review somewhere that these have a Sonos type experience, which I agree with, right down to the packaging. Classy product.
customer_reviews.author: derjie

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, the noise-cancelling function is excellent and the controls ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering buying some bluetooth earbuds for a while, then I did an about face and decided to try these on ear headphones. They are not the cheapest but I think the price is definitely borne out in the overall quality, style and usability of the product. I am really enjoying using them. They are very comfortable, the noise-cancelling function is excellent and the controls are responsive and easy to use (but not so responsive that you keep accidentally turning them off or skipping tracks). The only improvement would be if they came with a hard case, as opposed to the soft one included.
customer_reviews.author: shrinkydink

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I was expecting too much after reading the news paper reviews. Best sound is with ear plugs best noise cancellation is to move away from offending noise
customer_reviews.author: Masspecguy

customer_reviews.title: Danish delight!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and stylish on ear headphones. I have tried many anc headphones and so far these are my favourite. The touch conteols work well and the dit is just right.
customer_reviews.author: fat benjamin (Go Tee Gadgets)

customer_reviews.title: Quality and presentation
customer_reviews.text: I love them, the packaging was perfect, good first impresion. The app give you beginner tutorial for the controls, when i got used to them then it was perfect. For the price i paid the sound is realy good and i see a big future for libratone. Big ups for the good product
customer_reviews.author: Guntis Bruno Drake

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous value
customer_reviews.text: Had to check these were bonifide, £85 for£220 headphones? And yup, all checked out, so gifted my daughter a pair, she raved so got myself some and wow. Bargain. I see the price has gone up but even still at £115 if recommend. Currys still selling at £220 !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Is everything as promised. Bought 2 pairs, for me and my mate. After 3 mounths, still smiling and having fun. Super comfortable, noise cancellation is spot on.Hope the quality stays as is, because will give these to our grandkids when it's time for our new pair! Go for it, and enjoy the treat!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemari

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not quite top marks  for noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Nice design , lightweight and more comfortable than expected . Can listen for a couple of hours without too much of a problem.. Very good noise cancelling on most sources but the jury is still out on heavy bass coming from a neighbour or outside source
customer_reviews.author: GeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy - noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great colour, fits well and not bulky at all Use the black protective case to ensure they don’t get dirty
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and comfortable headphones. And great customer service as well. I literally can not hear my family when wearing these! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: LI5A

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The sound quality is excellent, especially for this price bracket. They're lovely, tactile things, feeling substantial but not heavy on the head. The noise cancelling is superb, dynamic tracks are easy going even by busy roads. Metal legs at the point where plastic often cracks. They fit well even on my huge head. They look great. Cons: The fabric will collect sweat and dirt. Not so easy to clean. Slip off my baldy head a little too easily. They're great though. Big recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little annoying if you have long hair.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Generally I worry about travelling, particularly on planes so have been looking for some really good noise cancelling headphones for a whole. These were discounted on amazon so went for them. They're very comfortable and the noise cancellation works really well. Music is clear and i have tried a wide range of music and it all seems good. Only thing i'd say is the buttons on the side seem to respond to my hair which is somewhat annoying to say the least! But thats a small annoyance which I can cope with to finally have some decent bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Miss I Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Quite good, but sounds quality not ok for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the touch control, reslky handle and resume automatically last played song. Voice cancellation do great job on 4 choices Battery are quite good. The audio quality is average, so no worthy for a high price. I compare it with my AKG NC60 and is quite poor on comparation.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: This excellent product has a number of positives. Sound quality is good, volume adjustment by touch controls is straightforward, and a nice extra feature allows muting by placing a hand over the ear cup. The noise cancellation feature is very effective. Battery life easily survives a day out and about and the padded cups and headband make it very comfortable to wear. There is a built-in microphone on one of the ear cups which works moderately well and has good sound pickup. Included accessories are a 3.5mm cable for backup use with non-Bluetooth devices, and a micro-USB charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Nice but terrible support from Libratone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones and have been happy upto now when they broke (the earcup popped out of the socket) and I got in touch with Libratone who've told me that they've stopped fixing these headphones, so I'm basically out of luck and need to chuck perfectly fine headphones away because they won't even try to fix it. Extremely disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diogo marques

customer_reviews.title: Superb style and sound
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, one of the hottest gadgets of 2017, these stylish wireless headphones are of the highest quality of sound. The depth of base is unrivalled in the Bluetooth headphones market. With them being on-ear, the noise reduction is at its maximum, offering an overall immersive listening experience in any conditions: traffic, tube commute, walking or jogging, listening to an audiobook is just as effortless as listening to a playlist. With more and more gadgets going wireless/Bluetooth now, pioneered by the iPhone 7, with which the Libratone headphones are fully compatible, these headphones are a futureproof investment. To top it all up, they come in the most beautiful presentation box, which would make them the ultimate present.
customer_reviews.author: Joachim + Suleyman

product_meta.title: Libratone Q Adapt 4-stage Active Noise Cancelling On-Ear Wireless Headphones (Bluetooth 4.1 aptX, ANC, 20 hrs Battery, Bluetooth + 1, Touch Control) - Stormy Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Stormy blackIntroducing Q Adapt On-Ear Wireless from Libratone, with CityMix, adjustable active noise cancelling. Choose how much of the world you let in or out, for outstanding quality music, clearer conversations, or absolute peace and quiet – at the touch of a button. Cutting-edge design meets beautiful simplicity in a choice of three different colours to suit every style and music. Use the Hush function to dim your music and tune in to the outside world, without -removing your headphones. Connect to a friend’s set over Bluetooth and enjoy your favourite music together. Get ready to immerse yourself in the deepest, fullest sound anyway, anywhere

BOX CONTAINS
Libratone Q Adapt Wireless Bluetooth On Ear Headphones - Stormy Black
feature_bullets: Adjustable noise cancelling function with CityMix
Enjoy the freedom to make and take calls and listen to your favourite music, wire-free, with Q Adapt Bluetooth headphones
With more than 20 hours of battery life; full recharge takes less than 3 hours
Touch controls - play, pause, change the track, activate the Hush function or simply crank up the volume, just by tapping the touch interface on your ear cup
Bluetooth +1 : Connect to a friend’s set over Bluetooth and enjoy your music together
